# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)

-  Burner mining drill (no other drills found)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drill has no fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has a fuel source before attempting to mine.

### Errors when stone furnace has no fuel
- Ensure that the stone furnace has a fuel source before attempting to smelt.

### Errors when burner inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a source of items to insert before attempting to insert.

### Errors when stone furnace has no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to smelt.

### Errors when offshore pump is not working
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly placed and has a power source before attempting to pump.

### Errors when boiler has no fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has a fuel source before attempting to boil.

### Errors when steam engine is not connected
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to a power source before attempting to generate power.

### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure that the pipe group has a fluid source before attempting to transport fluid.

### Errors when electricity group is not plugged in electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly plugged in to an electric network before attempting to generate power.

### Errors when belt group is empty
- Ensure that the belt group has a source of items to transport before attempting to transport.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided logs.
